alert.note: Alert for Cobb; Douglas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 8:44PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cobb and northeastern Douglas Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 844 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Powder Springs, or 8 miles southwest of Marietta. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Marietta, Douglasville, Smyrna, Kennesaw, Powder Springs, Austell, Lithia Springs, Fair Oaks, Due West, Lost Mountain Park, Jim R Miller Park and Mableton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
